Detailed Description

A control frame view is responsible for drawing the frame of a control including the default background of the client area.

View::Draw

Implements View.

Reimplemented in WindowFrameView.

void ControlFrameView::DrawClientAreaBackground (  const Control &  control,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [virtual]
 

Draws the default background for the client area of the control frame. Per default the area is filled with the color defined by Color::ClientBackground. Especially for the derived class WindowFrameView it makes sense to implement a custom background.

Reimplemented in DefaultWindowFrameView.

virtual void ControlFrameView::DrawControlFrame (  const Control &  control,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, pure virtual]
 

Draws the data of a frame described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
model Model describing the data of a frame.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implemented in BlueSkyControlFrameView, BlueSkyWindowFrameView, DefaultControlFrameView, DefaultWindowFrameView, TestControlFrameView, TestWindowFrameView, CTControlFrameView, CTWindowFrameView, DefaultControlFrameView, DefaultWindowFrameView, and FoggyWindowFrameView.

const Rect &  repaint_rect
